name: grimoire
description: Grimoire is a self-hosted note-taking and wiki platform for medieval or fantasy-style digital journaling. It supports markdown, tagging, linking, and timelines through a storytelling-oriented interface.
features: Bookmark Management: Save and organize web bookmarks with tags, descriptions, and full-text search.
Link Archiving: Automatically capture webpage snapshots to preserve content even if originals disappear.
Tag Organization: Categorize bookmarks with flexible tagging system for easy retrieval.
Full-Text Search: Search through bookmark titles, descriptions, and archived page content.
Browser Extensions: Save bookmarks directly from your browser with dedicated extensions.
Import/Export: Migrate bookmarks from browsers or other bookmark managers via standard formats.
Sharing Options: Share bookmark collections publicly or with specific users.
Self-Hosted Privacy: Keep your browsing history and bookmarks on your own infrastructure.
